channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Cocoon
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Cocoon

item.title: CVE-2022-45135|2024-08-03T14:09:55.444Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20cocoon
item.description:
Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Apache Cocoon.This issue affects Apache Cocoon: from 2.2.0 before 2.3.0.
Users are recommended to upgrade to version 2.3.0, which fixes the issue.
